item.title: Top News Ashiana Ispat Reports Q1 FY26 Loss Despite Revenue Growth of ₹8,721 Crores 1 day ago Ashiana Ispat Limited posted a net loss of ₹35.33 crores for Q1 FY26 despite generating revenue of ₹8,721.44 crores through its new asset-light business model. The company faces auditor qualifications regarding statutory dues and going concern issues, multiple legal proceedings including NCLT petitions and trademark disputes, while successfully settling ₹4,310 lakhs with SBI.
item.description: Top News Ashiana Ispat Reports Q1 FY26 Loss Despite Revenue Growth of ₹8,721 Crores 1 day ago Ashiana Ispat Limited posted a net loss of ₹35.33 crores for Q1 FY26 despite generating revenue of ₹8,721.44 crores through its new asset-light business model. The company faces auditor qualifications regarding statutory dues and going concern issues, multiple legal proceedings including NCLT petitions and trademark disputes, while successfully settling ₹4,310 lakhs with SBI.

item.title: LMW Limited Board Approves Sale of 9.77% Stake in Super Sales India Limited 50 minutes ago LMW Limited's Board of Directors has approved the sale of 3,00,000 equity shares, representing a 9.77% stake in Super Sales India Limited. The decision was made during a board meeting on December 15, 2025. The company has informed the stock exchanges about this transaction in compliance with SEBI regulations.
item.description: LMW Limited Board Approves Sale of 9.77% Stake in Super Sales India Limited 50 minutes ago LMW Limited's Board of Directors has approved the sale of 3,00,000 equity shares, representing a 9.77% stake in Super Sales India Limited. item.title: Pre-Market Setup: Global Cues and Key Factors Shaping Today's Session 3 hours ago GIFT Nifty up 0.18% at 26,058, hinting at a positive start. US markets closed lower, with NASDAQ down 1.69%. Asian markets mixed. Commodities show strength with gold up 0.64% and crude oil rising 0.63%. USD/INR stable at 90.54. FIIs net sellers, DIIs net buyers. Notable block deals in Usha Martin Ltd, with Peterhouse Investments reducing stake.
item.description: Pre-Market Setup: Global Cues and Key Factors Shaping Today's Session 3 hours ago GIFT Nifty up 0.18% at 26,058, hinting at a positive start. US markets closed lower, with NASDAQ down 1.69%. Asian markets mixed. Commodities show strength with gold up 0.64% and crude oil rising 0.63%. USD/INR stable at 90.54. FIIs net sellers, DIIs net buyers. Notable block deals in Usha Martin Ltd, with Peterhouse Investments reducing stake.

item.title: Corona Remedies Makes Strong Market Debut with 38% Premium 1 hour ago Corona Remedies, a pharmaceutical company, listed on the National Stock Exchange (NSE) at ₹1,470.00, marking a 38.42% premium over its IPO price of ₹1,062.00. The strong debut reflects positive investor sentiment towards the company and the pharmaceutical sector. This successful listing may boost confidence in upcoming IPOs, particularly in the healthcare space.
item.description: Corona Remedies Makes Strong Market Debut with 38% Premium 1 hour ago Corona Remedies, a pharmaceutical company, listed on the National Stock Exchange (NSE) at ₹1,470.00, marking a 38.42% premium over its IPO price of ₹1,062.00. The strong debut reflects positive investor sentiment towards the company and the pharmaceutical sector. This successful listing may boost confidence in upcoming IPOs, particularly in the healthcare space.
